text:
THE OHIO STATE UNIVERSITY
COLUMBUS
COLLEGE OF EDUCATION
Bureau of Educational Research
January 27, 19^0
Mr, Carl Menzer
State University of Iowa
Iowa City, Iowa
Dear Carl:
Now that we "begin work on the program for the Eleventh
Institute, we again write you to invite the National Association
of Educational Broadcasters to hold its regular closed meeting
on Monday evening, April 29. Please let me know whether the AsÂ¬
sociation will want this meeting again and whether, as usual, it
is to he a closed meeting. We are delighted to have this group
meet with us and are counting upon this regular meeting. May
I hear from you very soon?
Very cordially yours,
I. Keith Tyler
IKTjMMR
